title: trashbin not working if local folder is mounted
body:
the trashbin functionality is not working if the external storage app is enabled and some local storage without oc having write permission is mounted.
steps to reproduce:

1. enable external storage support
2. mount local storage where oc has no write permissions
3. delete a file
4. file doesn't show up in trashbin
5. unmount local storage
6. delete a file
7. file shows up in trashbin


two thinks which you could test and add to the bug report:

do you have enough free space / quota? otherwise the file will not be copied to the trash bin.
- yes, i have admin-privileges and enough space. i just deleted a small image for testing purposes.

check if data/"your_user_id"/files_trashbin/files was created and if the file is there.
- the folder was created, no file though

js console shows no errors,
